Verses: 1 amiththaayin Kumaaranaagiya Yonaavukkuk Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Undaagi, Avar:
2 nee Ezhundhu Magaa Nagaramaagiya Ninivekkup Poi, Adharku Virodhamaagap Prasangi; Avargaludaiya Akkiramam En Samugaththil Vandhu Ettinadhu Endraar.

3 appozhudhu Yonaa Karththarudaiya Samugaththinindru Vilagi, Tharsheesukku Odippogumpadi Ezhundhu, Yoppaavukkup Poi Tharsheesukkup Pogira Oru Kappalaikkandu, Koolikoduththu, Thaan Karththarudaiya Samugaththinindru Vilagumpadi, Avargalode Tharsheesukkup Pogak Kappal Erinaan.
4 karththar Samuththiraththinmel Perungaatrai Varavittaar; Adhinaal Kadalile Kappal Udaiyumendru Ninaikkaththakka Periya Kondhalippu Undaayitru.

5 appozhudhu Kapparkaarar Bayandhu, Avanavan Thanthan Dhevanai Nokki Vendudhalseydhu, Baaraththai Lesaakkumpadik Kappalil Irundha Sarakkugalai Samuththiraththil Erindhuvittaargal; Yonaavovendraal Kappalin Keezhththattil Irangipoip Paduththukkondu, Ayarndha Niththiraipanninaan.
6 appozhudhu Maalumi Avanidaththil Vandhu Nee Niththiraipannugiradhu Enna? Ezhundhirundh
